column2: the thing I liked least was a dish I usually love: shrimp and grits. Their spin used chorizo-flavored polenta in place of the grits (I should mention that this menu is loaded with chorizo in general
column3: so if you don't care for sausage your options are somewhat limited.) The shrimp were what is described as "Spanish baby ghost shrimp
column4: which turned out to be half-inch-long minnow-looking things. The tiny pinpoint black eyes on each is clearly visible, which disturbed me somewhat. Tasted okay, but would not order again.
